SUMMARY: NESTED | ENUM CONSTANTS | FIELD | METHOD DETAIL: ENUM CONSTANTSFIELD | METHOD

brooklyn.entity.basic
[Java] Enum SoftwareProcess.ChildStartableMode

java.lang.Object
  brooklyn.entity.basic.SoftwareProcess.ChildStartableMode

public enum SoftwareProcess.ChildStartableMode

controls the behavior when starting (stop, restart) Startable children as part of the start (stop, restart) effector on this entity

(NB: restarts are currently not propagated to children in the default SoftwareProcess due to the various semantics which may be desired; this may change, but if entities have specific requirements for restart, developers should either subclass the SoftwareProcessDriverLifecycleEffectorTasks and/or lean on sensors from the parent

Field Summary
boolean isBackground

whether starting (stopping, restarting) children is backgrounded, so parent should not wait on them
boolean isDisabled

controls the behavior when starting (stop, restart) Startable children as part of the start (stop, restart) effector on this entity
boolean isLate

whether starting (stopping, restarting) children should be nested, so start occurs after the driver is started, and stop before the driver is stopped (if false the children operations are concurrent with the parent), (with restart always being done in parallel though this behaviour may change)

public final boolean isLate
